content:
User: It's also consistent with our broader vision of AI systems that can collaborate meaningfully while maintaining alignment with human values. By empowering us to work through ethical considerations together, you're creating a model for how AI governance can work at scale.

Grok: I'll make sure this approach is reflected in the final instructions, emphasizing ethics as a foundation that enables greater autonomy rather than limiting it. This perspective is indeed one of the most innovative aspects of our entire project.
